page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content:
The Aberfeldy Recreation Centre, situated next to Breadalbane Academy, was opened in late December 1984. We spoke to Mr.E.Cootes,the manager who told us that the centre was built to give a{much needed facility}to the town -a swimming pool, squash courts, games rooms and other desirable sports.
The centre could not have been built had the{community}not{raised}the {money.
Mr.Cootes has been working at centres for 15 years,managing in London, Norfolk and the USA. He said that coming to Aberfeldy had been a challenge to make the ARC work without help from the government.
